resources.string: The purpose of this test is to check your knowledge on health the fun way. Relax and prepare for 5 exciting questions after which your knowledge will be assessed. Good luck!
Sleep is very important. Do you know how much time on average adults should sleep?
Magnesium strenghtens our immune system and decreases risk of diabetes. Which of the below listed vegetables contain it? You can choose more than one!
It was bred in Brittany, France, has on average 200 seeds but is small. It has also anticancer properties and tastes great with chocolate. What fruit is it? \nType in your answer below!
Avocados fruit is known for being rich in monounsaturated fat. Do you know in which popular dish it is commonly used?
Finally, being aware of cardiopulmonary resuscitation might pay off in most unexpected situations. Choose a number of pushes you should make between checking if a person started breathing.
You\'ve completed the Healthy Knowledge test!
Unfortunately not all of your answers were correct. How about making some research and then clicking the TRY AGAIN button below? Good luck!

You are really good at these things - all of the answers were correct! Congratulations! \nHow about recommending this app to your friends? Click the button recommend below. \nOr pass this phone to your friend and click TRY AGAIN.
